turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK sure, which cafe do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peets

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with an iced Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any milk or any other extras in there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah I'll get some whole milk and brown sugar on the side

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. What size for the iced americano?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. One large iced americano with whole milk and brown sugar, the total will be $2.95.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to order it from the location closest to your office?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. I will place the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK the order will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes. The total will be charged to your account, and the receipt will be sent to your mobile device

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you as well.
